item.title: About
item.description: Past: astronomy. 8-inch Dobsonian. Currently: motorcycles. BMW R1250 GSA vroomvroom Next: aviation. Gliders. Plus: science, technology, engineering, math Terry Pratchett, Patrick O’Brian Unix systems Bash, Python, C, Lisps, MLs

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: Send me an email Your name:        Your email:        Your message:  Send Uses Formspree messaging service

item.title: Privacy
item.description: This is a personal blog. I don’t harvest or sell any information to anyone. I use cookies only in the comments system to remember you so you don’t have to login again. I use Google and DuckDuckGo as search engines. I may end up using Google Analytics to see which posts are popular and to monitor total views for curiosity’s sake. At the moment (mid-2020), I don’t.
